sections.heading: Terms, defined.For purposes of sections 76-3601 to 76-3606:(1) Home inspection means the process by which a home inspector examines the observable systems and components of improvements to residential real property that are readily accessible to such inspector;(2) Home inspector means a person who,
sections.text: Terms, defined.For purposes of sections 76-3601 to 76-3606:(1) Home inspection means the process by which a home inspector examines the observable systems and components of improvements to residential real property that are readily accessible to such inspector;(2) Home inspector means a person who, for compensation, conducts a home inspection; and(3) Residential real property means a structure used or intended to be used as a residence and consisting of one to four family dwelling units.SourceLaws 2021, LB423, ยง 1.
